title: Can a water pump be used for a garden hose? I use a trash water pump to run my sprinkler off-grid.

tasks.task: Hooking up a two-inch trash pump to a normal sprinkler system.
subtasks: Acquire a two-inch trash pump from Harbor Freight.
Purchase necessary parts from the parts store to connect the pump to a normal garden hose.
Assemble the adapter system consisting of two-inch female coupler, reducers, PVC pipe, and hose adapters.
Connect the assembled adapters to the two-inch hose and normal garden hose.
Test the system by running the pump and connecting the garden hose to the sprinkler system.
Evaluate the system's functionality and reliability for irrigation purposes.
